name: Crisis Before Christmas
description:
Crisis Before Christmas is a Point&Click Adventure game set a day before Christmas. Benjamin has ordered Bertle Royale, the new card game that all the kids love to play, for his son, Mark. But when the parcel gets lost, Ben needs to come up with a plan. He would not want to see Mark's disappointed face at Christmas. But the game is nearly sold out all around town.

Navigate the town of Klagenfurt in this adventure. Meet interesting people. See who can help you get that game. Or not. Multiple endings included. Have fun!
